page.title: 05LOCAL RADIO FOR N.S.
page.content: In 1983{B.B.C Radio Solway}was introduced to Dumfries and Galloway. Radio Solway is on the air from Monday to Friday.The local radio broadcasts local reports and information from their studios at{Elmbank,Lovers Walk, {Dumfries.}From Monday to Thursday Radio Solway is on the air from 7.30am-8am for reports,Thought for the Day, quizzes,etc.Radio Solway offers programmes on fishing,music,cooking, farming and other topics from 12 noon to 12.30pm.Friday mornings are just normal,but at lunch time Friday Call Out is on.This is when you phone in live to Radio Solway to give messages like Happy Birthday or Get Well Soon to hospital patients or friends.{
